text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
… Wow. I didn't know you guys
were here for the finals.

text_block_list.name: Bitter Glasse
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the Aoharu Hai! I had a
great race thanks to you guys.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
… Well, but that's that. It has
nothing to do with today's race.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
Our team will win this time.
Don't forget that.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text: … Oh shut up. I just mixed them up.
